com.krab.lazy

Class ColorPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.krab.lazy.ColorPoint

  • public class ColorPoint
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for initializing a gradient with a set of default colors at default positions. See LazyGui.gradient(String, ColorPoint...) for more information.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
